entry.tran: 网眼织物的；蕾丝做的；带蕾丝的
entry.def: Lacy things are made from lace or have pieces of lace attached to them.

entry.tran: （尤指因娇柔）呈蕾丝状的，似蕾丝的
entry.def: Lacy is used to describe something that looks like lace, especially because it is very delicate.
